name: RUNOUT (itch)
description:
An endless runner in a sexy sythwave environnement with punchy sountrack by Occams Laser !  Game features :
  • Infinite procedural level
  • Run, Jump and Shoot based Gameplay
  • Hardcore Gameplay
  • Awesome Soundtracks
Credits :

Aymeric Proux (@FrThecube) Game Design, Art and Program 

Tom / Occams Laser (@occams_laser_) Music
